original: Paṭisambhidāmagga
analyzed: paṭisambhidā magga
translated: The Path of Discrimination

original: 1 Mahāvagga
analyzed: mahāvagga
translated: The Great Section

original: 1.7. Kammakathā
analyzed: kamma kathā
translated: … Discussion of Action

original: Ahosi kammaṁ, ahosi kammavipāko.
analyzed: ahosi kamma ahosi kamma vipāko
translated: There was action, there was the result of action.

original: Ahosi kammaṁ, nāhosi kammavipāko.
analyzed: ahosi kamma na ahosi kamma vipāko
translated: There was action, there was not the result of action.

original: Ahosi kammaṁ, atthi kammavipāko.
analyzed: ahosi kamma atthi kamma vipāko
translated: There was action, there is the result of action.

original: Ahosi kammaṁ, natthi kammavipāko.
analyzed: ahosi kamma natthi kamma vipāko
translated: There was action, there is not the result of action.

original: Ahosi kammaṁ, bhavissati kammavipāko.
analyzed: ahosi kamma bhavissati kamma vipāko
translated: There was action, there will be the result of action.

original: Ahosi kammaṁ, na bhavissati kammavipāko.
analyzed: ahosi kamma na bhavissati kamma vipāko
translated: There was action, there will not be the result of action.

original: (Atītakammaṁ)
analyzed: atīta kamma
translated: (Past action)

original: Atthi kammaṁ, atthi kammavipāko.
analyzed: atthi kamma atthi kamma vipāko
translated: There is action, there is the result of action.

original: Atthi kammaṁ, natthi kammavipāko.
analyzed: atthi kamma na atthi kamma vipāko
translated: There is action, there is not the result of action.

original: Atthi kammaṁ, bhavissati kammavipāko.
analyzed: atthi kamma bhavissati kamma vipāko
translated: There is action, there will be the result of action.

original: Atthi kammaṁ, na bhavissati kammavipāko.
analyzed: atthi kamma na bhavissati kamma vipāko
translated: There is action, there will not be the result of action.

original: (Paccuppannakammaṁ)
analyzed: paccuppanna kamma
translated: (Present action)

original: Bhavissati kammaṁ, bhavissati kammavipāko.
analyzed: bhavissati kamma bhavissati kamma vipāko
translated: There will be action, there will be the result of action.

original: Bhavissati kammaṁ, na bhavissati kammavipāko.
analyzed: bhavissati kamma na bhavissati kamma vipāko
translated: There will be action, there will not be the result of action.

original: (Anāgatakammaṁ)🔽Ahosi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, ahosi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: anāgata kamma  ahosi kusalam kamma ahosi kusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: (Future action)🔽There was wholesome action, there was the result of wholesome action.

original: Ahosi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, nāhosi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi kusalam kamma na ahosi kusalassa kammassa vipākaḥ
translated: There was wholesome action, there was not the result of wholesome action.

original: Ahosi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, atthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi kusalam kamma atthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There was wholesome kamma, there is the result of wholesome kamma.

original: Ahosi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, natthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi kusalam kamma na atthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There was wholesome kamma, there is no result of wholesome kamma.

original: Ahosi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi kusalam kamma bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There was wholesome kamma, there will be the result of wholesome kamma.

original: Ahosi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi kusalam kamma na bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There was wholesome kamma, there will not be the result of wholesome kamma.

original: Atthi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, atthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: atthi kusalam kamma atthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There is wholesome kamma, there is the result of wholesome kamma.

original: Atthi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, natthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: atthi kusalam kamma na atthi kusalassa kammassa vipākaḥ
translated: There is wholesome kamma, there is no result of wholesome kamma.

original: Atthi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: atthi kusalam kamma bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There is wholesome kamma, there will be the result of wholesome kamma.

original: Atthi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: atthi kusalam kamma na bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipākaḥ
translated: There is wholesome kamma, there will not be the result of wholesome kamma.

original: Bhavissati kusalaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: bhavissati kusalam kamma bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There will be wholesome kamma, there will be the result of wholesome kamma.

original: Bhavissati kusalaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: bhavissati kusalam kamma na bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipākaḥ
translated: There will be wholesome kamma, there will not be the result of wholesome kamma.

original: Ahosi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, ahosi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi akusalam kamma ahosi akusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There was unwholesome kamma, there was the result of unwholesome kamma.

original: Ahosi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, nāhosi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi akusalam kamma na ahosi akusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There was an unwholesome deed, but there was no result of an unwholesome deed.

original: Ahosi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, atthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi akusalam kamma atthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There was an unwholesome deed, and there is a result of an unwholesome deed.

original: Ahosi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, natthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi akusalam kamma na atthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There was an unwholesome deed, but there is no result of an unwholesome deed.

original: Ahosi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi akusalam kamma bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There was an unwholesome deed, and there will be a result of an unwholesome deed.

original: Ahosi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi akusalam kamma na bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There was an unwholesome deed, but there will be no result of an unwholesome deed.

original: Atthi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, atthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: atthi akusalam kamma atthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There is an unwholesome deed, and there is a result of an unwholesome deed.

original: Atthi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, natthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: atthi akusalam kamma na atthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There is an unwholesome deed, but there is no result of an unwholesome deed.

original: Atthi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: atthi akusalam kamma bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There is an unwholesome deed, and there will be a result of an unwholesome deed.

original: Atthi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: atthi akusalam kamma na bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There is an unwholesome deed, but there will be no result of an unwholesome deed.

original: Bhavissati akusalaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: bhavissati akusalam kamma bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There will be an unwholesome deed, and there will be a result of an unwholesome deed.

original: Bhavissati akusalaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: bhavissati akusalam kamma na bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There will be an unwholesome deed, but there will be no result of an unwholesome deed.

original: Ahosi sāvajjaṁ kammaṁ …pe…
analyzed: ahosi sāvajjam kammam pe
translated: There was blameworthy deeds …

original: ahosi anavajjaṁ kammaṁ …pe…🔽ahosi kaṇhaṁ kammaṁ …pe…
analyzed: ahosi anavajjam kammam pe  ahosi kaṇham kammam pe
translated: There was blameless deeds …🔽There was dark deeds …

original: ahosi sukkaṁ kammaṁ …pe…🔽ahosi sukhudrayaṁ kammaṁ …pe…
analyzed: ahosi sukkam kammam pe  kammam pe
translated: There was bright deeds …🔽There was deeds that lead to a small place …

original: ahosi dukkhudrayaṁ kammaṁ …pe…
analyzed: ahosi dukkhudrayam kammam pe
translated: There was deeds that lead to a great place …

original: ahosi sukhavipākaṁ kammaṁ …pe…
analyzed: ahosi sukha vipākam kammaṃ pe
translated: There was deeds that ripen in happiness …

original: ahosi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, ahosi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi dukkha vipākam kamma ahosi dukkha vipākassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There was deeds that ripen in suffering, and there was the ripening of deeds that ripen in suffering.

original: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, nāhosi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi dukkha vipākam kamma na ahosi dukkha vipākassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There was deeds that ripen in suffering, but there was no ripening of deeds that ripen in suffering.

original: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, atthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi dukkha vipākam kamma atthi dukkha vipākassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There was deeds that ripen in suffering, and there was the ripening of deeds that ripen in suffering.

original: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, natthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi dukkha vipākam kamma natthi dukkha vipākassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There was deeds that ripen in suffering, but there was no ripening of deeds that ripen in suffering.

original: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi dukkha vipākam kamma bhavissati dukkha vipākassa kammassa vipākaḥ
translated: There was deeds that ripen in suffering, and there will be the ripening of deeds that ripen in suffering.

original: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: ahosi dukkha vipākam kamma na bhavissati dukkha vipākassa kammassa vipākaḥ
translated: There was deeds that ripen in suffering, but there will be no ripening of deeds that ripen in suffering.

original: Atthi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, atthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: atthi dukkha vipākam kamma atthi dukkha vipākassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There are deeds that ripen in suffering, and there is the ripening of deeds that ripen in suffering.

original: Atthi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, natthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: atthi dukkha vipākam kamma na atthi dukkha vipākassa kammassa vipāko
translated: There is kamma that has results in the form of pain, but there is no result of that kamma.

original: Atthi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: atthi dukkha vipākam kamma bhavissati dukkha vipākassa kammassa vipākaḥ
translated: There is kamma that has results in the form of pain, and there will be a result of that kamma.

original: Atthi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: atthi dukkha vipākam kamma na bhavissati dukkha vipākassa kammassa vipākaḥ
translated: There is kamma that has results in the form of pain, but there will be no result of that kamma.

original: Bhavissati dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
analyzed: bhavissati dukkha vipākam kamma bhavissati dukkha vipākassa kammassa vipākaḥ
translated: There will be kamma that has results in the form of pain, and there will be a result of that kamma.

original: Bhavissati dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipākoti.
analyzed: bhavissati dukkha vipākam kamma na bhavissati dukkha vipākassa kammassa vipākaḥ ti
translated: There will be kamma that has results in the form of pain, but there will be no result of that kamma.

original: Kammakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kamma kathā niṭṭhitā
translated: The Discussion of Kamma is finished.
